title: Smart Data Models - Agri Parcel Record
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of the conditions recorded on a parcel of land. This entity is primarily associated with the agricultural vertical and related IoT applications.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type. It has to be AgriParcelRecord

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

soilTemperature.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. The observed soil temperature nominally in degrees centigrade. Units:'degrees centigrade'

soilMoistureVwc.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Measured as Volumetric Water Content, VWC as a percentage. 0 <= soilMoistureVwc <= 1

soilMoistureEC.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Measured as Electrical Conductivity, EC nominally in units of Siemens per meter. Units:'siemens / m'

solarRadiation.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Instantaneous solar radiation measured in kW/m2. Units:'kW/m2'

soilSalinity.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. It is the salt content in the soil

relativeHumidity.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Relative Humidity a number between 0 and 1 representing the range of 0% to 100%.

leafWetness.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. It is a meteorological parameter that describes the amount of dew and precipitation left on surfaces.

leafRelativeHumidity.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Relative humidity on the surface of the leaves

leafTemperature.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. The observed leaf temperature nominally in degrees centigrade. Units:'degrees centigrade'

atmosphericPressure.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Atmospheric Pressure nominally in units of hecto Pascals. Units:'hecto Pascals'

hasDevice.description: Relationship. Model:'http://schema.org/URL'. Reference to the IoT devices associated with this item i.e. sensors, controls.

depth.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Metadata to indicate the associated depth where soil measurements are taken
